Hi, all,
 
I am new to JUnit. And I am running the JUnit plug-in
in Eclipse. 
And I found some strange failure when running the
junit.samples.AllTests. Apart from the 
ordinary failures that the documentation mentions, I
found these failures that is not mentioned:
 at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native
Method)
 at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
 at
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
 
And when I double click on the failure I don't get
directed to the class file and instead get a "class
file editor" error
which says:
"Source not found: 
The source attachment does not contain the source for
the file NativeMethodAccessImpl
You can change the source attachment  by clicking
Change Attached Source below:"
(Clicking on all other failures would direct me to the
according file)
Now even google "NativeMethodAccessImpl" doesn't
return anything. Am I missing something here?
 
 
The whole failure trace is posted as below:
 
java.lang.NullPointerException
 at
junit.runner.BaseTestRunner.getPreference(BaseTestRunner.java:178)
 at
junit.runner.BaseTestRunner.filterStack(BaseTestRunner.java:220)
 at
junit.tests.StackFilterTest.testFilter(StackFilterTest.java:45)
 at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native
Method)
 at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
 at
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
 at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324)
 at
junit.framework.TestCase.runTest(TestCase.java:166)
 at
junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:140)
 at
junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
 at
junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
 at
junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
 at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:131)
 at
junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:180)
 at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:175)
 at
junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:180)
 at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:175)
 at
junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:180)
 at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:175)
 at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.runTests(RemoteTestRunner.java:397)
 at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.run(RemoteTestRunner.java:281)
 at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.main(RemoteTestRunner.java:173)
